name: driftingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that moves, or seems to move, slowly and with no one or nothing controlling it: The birds floated driftingly on the icy water. He moved driftingly towards the stairs, as if in a dream. Related word
drifting
More examplesFewer examplesSmoke rose driftingly from the chimneys of the cottages.These thoughts came to her driftingly as she fell asleep.The fog swirled around them, damp and driftingly white.The memories of what had happened came back to him driftingly, in fragments.
